attributes.action: Heavily Increase Military spend such that our brave service men and women can be given adequate eqipment and increased pay,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Heavily Increase Military spend such that our brave service men and women can be given adequate eqipment and increased pay,so as to insure we do not let valauble british lives go to waste due to government incompetents
